text: Ramparts of Brabant (Dutch:De omwalling van Brabant, French:Rempart du Brabant) is a 1921 Belgian silent film directed by Théo Bergerat.Rège p.85 == References == ==Bibliography== * Philippe Rège. Encyclopedia of French Film Directors, Volume 1.
